trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre como o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A collection that supports <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView> raises this event when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem%2A> is changing or when the content of the collection has been reset.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que dá suporte a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView>gera esse evento quando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem%2A>está sendo alterado ou quando o conteúdo da coleção foi redefinido.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentItem%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView>

trans-unit.source: By default, the event is cancelable when the cause is a move-current operation (such as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.MoveCurrentTo%2A> and similar methods) and uncancelable when the cause is an irreversible change operation on the collection.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o evento é anulável quando a causa é uma operação de movimentação atual (como o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.MoveCurrentTo%2A>e métodos semelhantes) e uncancelable quando a causa é uma operação de alteração irreversível na coleção.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.MoveCurrentTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs.IsCancelable%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão de <xref:System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs.IsCancelable%2A>é de propriedade `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs.IsCancelable%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified isCancelable value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do classe com especificado isCancelable valor.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the event is cancelable.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se o evento é anulável.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to cancel the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve cancelar o evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event is to be canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o evento deve ser cancelado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs.IsCancelable*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor de <xref:System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs.IsCancelable*>é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CurrentChangingEventArgs.IsCancelable*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the event is cancelable.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o evento é anulável.

trans-unit.source: By default, the event is cancelable when the cause is a move-current operation (such as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.MoveCurrentTo%2A> and similar methods) and uncancelable when the cause is an irreversible change operation on the collection.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o evento é anulável quando a causa é uma operação de movimentação atual (como o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.MoveCurrentTo%2A>e métodos semelhantes) e uncancelable quando a causa é uma operação de alteração irreversível na coleção.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.MoveCurrentTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event is cancelable, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o evento for anulável, caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
